name: AP_CLAIM_IF_DX_HAC_ROM_FL
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Interface Info - Grouper Dx - Affect ROM Flag (I CLM 21850) item.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DX_AFFECT_ROM_FLAG
columns.description: How the diagnosis affected risk of mortality calculation.
